author: jukka
msg: JCR-956: Added logging in proxy repository for cases when an exception can not be thrown.

author: jukka
msg: JCR-956: Changed the JNDI repository proxy to use lazy loading only for the lookup within a JNDI context, not for instantiating the JNDI context itself. Otherwise clients in different threads or in different class loaders (for example when accessing the repository proxy from another webapp) may end up using separate JNDI contexts.

author: oheger
msg: CONFIGURATION-279: Fix PropertiesConfiguration to work correctly when created from a non-existing file; the layout object is now created manually in this case

author: oheger
msg: Changed AbstractFileConfiguration.save(URL) to always close the output stream
